Package org.asteroid

package org.asteroid
Useful in various purpose like data entry, mensuration based calculation, unit conversion, Encryption process, etc
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.asteroid.graphics
    Makes graphics programming easier with simple codes
    org.asteroid.math
    Contains classes to perform calculation
    org.asteroid.mensuration
    Helpful in performing calculation based on finding area, volume, surface area and perimeter
    org.asteroid.security
    Helpful in encryption process
    org.asteroid.units
    This package is helpful in unit conversion
    org.asteroid.util
    Helpful in utility purpose like Time management, accessing system information, etc.

    Description
    Array
    Manage and perform operation based on Arrays

    It has the case values for the inputString method of Input class

    Gives the functionality of executing System shell commands.
    ConvertionError
    Raised when time is converted to another unit
    EmptyArrayException
    Raised when an empty array is passed to org.asteroid.Array.max(int...)
    FileLineOutOfBoundIndex
    Raised when the file has less number of lines than specified index
